roleset.name: strike
roleset.note: BEAT-V NOTES: Comparison with 'hit' and 'win'. beat 0.2 and beat 0.3. Based on financial subcorpus. Verbnet classes hit-18.1-1. (from beat.01-v)
BEATING-N NOTES: Roleset based on instances in BOLT P01. Based on comparison to beat-v.01, maps to VN class 18.1-1, noun has no FN frame. (from beating.01-n)

role.descr: instrument, thing hit by or with

example.name: violence
example.text: Mary beat John with a wet noodle.

example.name: All args
example.text: Earlier this week, former Springfield cop Jeffrey Asher was convicted of assault and battery, resulting from his beating, with a flashlight, of Melvin Jones III.

roleset.name: (cause) pulsating motion that often makes sound
roleset.note: BEAT-V NOTES: I have the feeling this will always occur as "beat down(ward)". (from beat.02-v)
BEAT-N NOTES: Roleset based on verb entry beat.02 (sort of), OntoNotes grouping beat-n senses 2, 4, 6; maps to VN class sound_emission-43.2. Framed by Claire. (from beat.01-n)

roles.note: Co-occurence of all arguments seems unlikely, usually this would be "beating" rather than "beat." (from beat.01-n)

example.name: all args, passivized
example.text: Another proposed reform is to have program traders answer to an ``uptick rule'' a reform instituted after the Great Crash of 1929 that protects against [stocks]-2 being relentlessly beaten *trace*-2 downward by those seeking to profit from lower prices, namely short sellers.
example.arg: by those seeking to profit from lower prices, namely short sellers

example.name: Heart beat
example.text: Her beart was beating against her chest.

example.name: Arg 1 only
example.text: He lay his head against her chest to feel the beat of her heart.

example.name: Args 0 & 1
example.text: The rock band's incessant drum beat kept me awake all night.

example.name: Args 1 & 2
example.text: The beat of the rain against the window lulled her into sleep.

example.name: no stated competition
example.text: Now, after *trace* beating them, Mr. Achenbaum is joining them.

example.text: The product isn't widely used yet, but Toshiba, which [*T-1*] has already beaten everyone else in producing the current-generation one-megabit DRAMs...
